00026  */

00029 #define P_tmpdir "/tmp"

00063 #define RECV_SIZE 8192 // initial size of the receive buffer
00064 #define MAX_ARGS 100   // max # of method arguments
00065 
00066 /* checks if we use a servlet backend (re-directed or not) */
00067 #define IS_SERVLET_BACKEND(env) (((*env)->servlet_ctx || EXT_GLOBAL (get_servlet_context) (TSRMLS_C)))
00068 
00069 /* checks if the servlet backend uses HTTP, either because we do not
00070    re-direct or because we override re-direct */
00071 #define IS_OVERRIDE_REDIRECT(env) ((((*env)->peer0!=-1) || EXT_GLOBAL (get_servlet_context) (TSRMLS_C)))
00072 
00073 typedef struct proxyenv_ *proxyenv;
00074 struct proxyenv_ {
00075 
00076   /* peer */
00077   int peer, peer0;              /* peer0 contains peer during override
00078                                    redirect */
00079   short peer_redirected;        /* remains true during override
00080                                    redirect */
00081   struct sockaddr orig_peer_saddr; /* only valid if peer is a servlet, it
00082                                    points to the original peer */
00083 
00084 
00085   /* used by the parser implementation */
00086   unsigned char*s; size_t len; 
00087   ssize_t pos, c; 
00088   unsigned char recv_buf[RECV_SIZE];
00089 
00090   /* the send buffer */
00091   unsigned char*send;
00092   size_t send_len, send_size;
00093 
00094   char *server_name;
00095 
00096   /* local server (not a servlet engine) */
00097   short is_local;
00098 
00099   /* for servlets: re-open connection */
00100   short must_reopen; 
00101 
00102   /* for servlet engines only */
00103   char *servlet_ctx, *servlet_context_string;
00104   
00105   void (*handle_request)(proxyenv *env);
00106 
00107   void (*writeCreateObjectBegin)(proxyenv *env, char*name, size_t strlen, char createInstance, void *result);
00108   void (*writeCreateObjectEnd)(proxyenv *env);
00109   void (*writeInvokeBegin)(proxyenv *env, long object, char*method, size_t strlen, char property, void* result);
00110   void (*writeInvokeEnd)(proxyenv *env);
00111   void (*writeResultBegin)(proxyenv *env, void* result);
00112   void (*writeResultEnd)(proxyenv *env);
00113   void (*writeGetMethodBegin)(proxyenv *env, long object, char*method, size_t strlen, void* result);
00114   void (*writeGetMethodEnd)(proxyenv *env);

00116   void (*writeCallMethodEnd)(proxyenv *env);
00117   void (*writeString)(proxyenv *env, char*name, size_t strlen);
00118   void (*writeBoolean)(proxyenv *env, short boolean);
00119   void (*writeLong)(proxyenv *env, long l);
00120   void (*writeDouble)(proxyenv *env, double d);
00121   void (*writeObject)(proxyenv *env, long object);
00122   void (*writeException)(proxyenv *env, long object, char*str, size_t len);
00123   void (*writeCompositeBegin_a)(proxyenv *env);
